title: Borrow more, buy more: Credit still king of shopper street
description: According to Counterpoint, the share of credit-based purchases of smartphones increased. Sales growth of apparel, footwear, beauty products, and quick service restaurants halved in 2023. Cars and electronics recorded growth mostly in the premium segment.
